name: 60 Seconds in Africa
description:
Did you know every 60 Seconds In Africa, a minute passes? 

Well every minute, the evil scientist who modified your body is releasing more of his creations to kill you! This would be an easy walk in the Savannah if only your neck wasn't malfunctioning. 

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Free Look - Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Credits: 

John Harger: Programmer, Giraffe Wrangler

Brandon Baldwin: 3D Artist, Level Designer, SFX/VFX, Rhino Rumbler

Adrienne Neef: 2D/3D Artist, Lion Tamer

Miko: Music, Hyena Heckler

Quixel Megascan assets were used in the production of our game.
